title: Caesar Clown's Name References the Joker
theoryText: Caesar Clown's name is likely a combination of Caesar Romero (the first actor to play the Joker in live-action) and 'Clown'. This connects to his SMILE production, as the SMILEs have many similarities to Joker Venom from Batman comics - both cause uncontrollable smiling/laughter.
author: One Piece Wiki/Fandom Contributors

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: References SMILE production and effects seen in later Punk Hazard and Dressrosa episodes

title: Monet as Doflamingo's Spy on Caesar
theoryText: Despite their business relationship, Vergo and Joker's distrust towards Caesar led them to place Monet in Caesar's organization to monitor his actions. This suggests Doflamingo never fully trusted Caesar and wanted eyes on his operations at Punk Hazard.
author: 12Dimension Blog

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Monet's true role and the entire Punk Hazard arc

title: The Marine Mole in G-5
theoryText: Smoker suspects a mole within the Marines' G-5 base covering up Caesar's crimes. This theory suggests that Vergo, as the G-5 base commander, was the mole working for Doflamingo and deliberately covering up the child abduction cases to protect Caesar's experiments.
author: One Piece Community Discussion

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Vergo's true identity is revealed later in Punk Hazard arc

title: Joker's Identity Speculation (Pre-Reveal)
theoryText: After Episode 589 aired, fans speculated about who 'Joker' was. Some theorized it could be Doflamingo based on his influence in the underworld and his known connections to illegal operations. Others thought it might be a new character entirely or even someone from the World Government.
author: One Piece Community (2013)

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Joker's identity as Doflamingo is confirmed in later episodes
